item.title: How to get xp when using item with item
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

Underneath staticAnimation(441,absX,absY, 100), add:

addSkillXP(1000, 13);

Replace the 1000 with the amount of xp you wish to award. 13 is the skill number for crafting.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get xp when using item with item
item.dc:creator: @devildude797 devildude797
item.description:
@devildude797 wrote:

how do i get xp if i use an item with an item?
this is my command for item on item:

} if(itemUsed == 1765 && useWith == 1761) { deleteItem(1761, getItemSlot(1761), 1); deleteItem(1765, getItemSlot(1765), 1); addItem(1040, 1); staticAnimation(441,absX,absY, 100); sendMessage("You mix the yellow dye with the clay to make a phat."); staticAnimation(441,absX,absY, 100); }

Read full topic
